Joke[]

Trivia[]

Ashe, the Frost Archer
  • Some of Ashe's first encounter and taunt quotes poke fun at her outfit, which many have noted to be ill-suited for the Freljord's cold environment.
  • ▶️  "So, which one is the pig? Kidding!" references More Rammus Taunts.
  • ▶️  "No, really, put that apple on your head..." references William Tell's apple-shot.
  • Ashe shares quotes with:
    • ▶️   ▶️   "For the Freljord!"
PROJECT: Ashe
  • ▶️  "Resistance is not futile - it's human" references a line from Star Trek: The Next Generation. ("Resistance is futile.")
  • ▶️  "May the odds be ever in our favor" references The Hunger Games.
  • ▶️  "I thought you'd be taller" quotes Commander Sarah Palmer from Halo 4.
  • ▶️  "War. What is it good for, AVAROSA?" quotes War (The Temptations song).
  • ▶️  "That escalated quickly" is an iconic quote by Ron Burgundy from Anchorman.
  • ▶️  "I can do this all day" is a catchphrase by Captain America from the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
High Noon Ashe
  • ▶️  "All the West on one arrow" references Ashe's selection quote (▶️   "All the world on one arrow.")
  • ▶️  "Absolution, now there's a funny word" is similar to ▶️  "Justice. That's a pretty word."
  • ▶️  "Heaven was a place on earth..." might reference the song Heaven Is a Place on Earth by Belinda Carlisle.
  • ▶️  "Heaven is empty and all the angels are gone..." is a play on a quote from William Shakespeare's The Tempest. (Hell is empty and all the devils are here.)
  • ▶️  "One, two, three... and such" pokes fun at Jhin's obsession with the number 4.
  • ▶️  "More like 'the man with the open grave'" refers to The Man with the Grinning Shadow, as well as High Noon Lucian's death animation.
